column5: After years of fishing Now Narrows on Red lake we are going to Long legged lake North lodge over Labour day week. If anyone has any suggestions of what to bring for tackle or what we need to know about the area all help will be appreciated. Thank you
http://www.longleggedlakeresorts.com/WhatToBring.htm  This lake? That resort sort of covers the basics?  LOL, there are probably rocks and shoals in the water, and wild animals on shore?
